title: CarTrade Tech tanks 10% after company reports loss in Q4 - Economic Times
content: CarTrade Tech tanks 10% after company reports loss in Q4  Economic Times
description: Following the development, shares of CarTrade Technologies tumbled about 10 per cent to Rs 573.50, before trading at Rs 589.55 at 9.50 am. The scrip had settled at Rs 636.10 on Wednesday.
